column5: Whenever I try to upload a new avatar I get this message:  "The upload failed - there was a problem moving the avatar to the uploads directory. Please verify permissions are set correctly on the uploads folder."  Any ideas?
Can't upload a picture to a thread either today. Something is amiss after the website being moved to it's own server.
This has been going on since Tuesday.  But I didn't know the website was moved to another server.  That would explain it.
Yah.. it'll post linked pic Bernie.. just won't take a direct upload from your computer.
Ooops. Guess I should have read more thoroughly. Thanks Wayne.
